newsitem.title: THAILAND: Four Thais killed in the trawler engine room blast.
newsitem.headline: Four Thais killed in the trawler engine room blast.

text.p: Four Thai fishermen were killed and two injured in an explosion in the engine room of a fishing trawler where they were doing repair work police said on Wednesday.

The blast on Tuesday was believed to have been caused by leaking ammonia from a pipe in the engine room of the stationary trawler at Samut Sakorn province, about 80 kilometres (50 miles) south of Bangkok, police said.
